alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 3:31AM MST until December 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The Arco and Mud Lake desert area, including the towns of Arco, Mud Lake, Terreton, Craters of the Moon, and the Idaho National Laboratory. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect pockets of reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
